mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_attr_value (id, `name`, attr_key_id, product_id) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attrKeyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT pak.display_name AS displayName, pak.NAME AS `key`, pav.NAME AS `value` FROM product_attr_value pav JOIN product_attr_key AS pak ON pak.id = pav.attr_key_id WHERE pav.product_id = #{productId};
